title: [BUG] Cursor 1 char ahead on wrapped lines in input

logs.msg: User clarified: cursor is ON the just-typed char, not AFTER it. On wrapped second line, typing 's' after 'history' shows cursor highlighting 's' instead of position after it. This is off-by-one in cursor calculation.
CRITICAL: User cannot delete last char because cursor can't select past it. Cursor positioning bug is blocking basic editing on wrapped lines.
